section.title: standard journal groups posting of Post Standard Journal Group
section.para: To post a Standard Journal Group, select the "Post Standard Journal Group" option. The following screen will appear:
When posting a Standard Journal Group, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Standard Journal Group you want to post.
Indicates date when the Standard Journal Group should be posted to the General Ledger.
Select if you want to reverse the selected Standard Journal Group when it is posted.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without posting the Standard Journal Group, returning you to the application desktop.
Posts the Standard Journal Group to the General Ledger effective on the specified distribution date.
Select to submit the Standard Journal Group to the Batch Manager. For additional information, see .
